channel.title: Notice on Institute of Smart City & Management
channel.description: Recent content in Notice on Institute of Smart City & Management

item.title: Studiolab Rules
item.description: Studiolab Rules Don’t eat or drink in the lab (bottle of water is allow, however it should be put on the floor) Remain silent Keep the lab clean and tidy at all time Self manage belongings Be responsible, respect every one Lab Equipment Don’t use any equipment without specitic instructions Check and report equipment condition before use Return the equipment to the origional position after use
